title: Thunderstorm Watch Face
summary: Got an Android 5.0 watch?  Set it apart with clouds, rain, and lightning!
description: Why settle for just hands that move?  Fill your watch with a dramatic thunderstorm!Featuring a selection of modern and abstract watch faces, you can pick the style of timekeeping that appeals to you.  Choose your favorite typeface.  Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date.  Show only the features you need.  If a notification is present, the face will smoothly reduce to fill the remaining space.Behind the watch face itself are layers of clouds, rain, and lighting -- and you can take control there, too.  Control lightning coloration, sunlight color, where and how often the lightning strikes, the behavior of the rain, and more!NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device.  They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device.  Both round and square faces are fully supported.Check your Android Wear app to set!We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.storm
descriptionHTML:
Why settle for just hands that move? Fill your watch with a dramatic thunderstorm!

Featuring a selection of modern and abstract watch faces, you can pick the style of timekeeping that appeals to you. Choose your favorite typeface. Enable display of features such as a compass, moon phase, battery remaining, and current date. Show only the features you need. If a notification is present, the face will smoothly reduce to fill the remaining space.

Behind the watch face itself are layers of clouds, rain, and lighting -- and you can take control there, too. Control lightning coloration, sunlight color, where and how often the lightning strikes, the behavior of the rain, and more!

NOTE: Our watch faces require Android 5.0 on your Wear device. They fully respect sleep mode, and will fade in the moving background when you wake the device. Both round and square faces are fully supported.

Check your Android Wear app to set!

We don't yet have a video for this product, but you can check out the behavior of the live wallpaper version here : http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fishnoodle.storm
comments: Works flawlessly with loads of personalization options! The Thunderstorm Watch Face - just like the matching "live" wallpaper from the same developer - looks incredible, has LOADS of options to configure the watchface to your personal preferences and works flawlessly. If you like your mobile devices sharing a common theme, or you just want something that looks particularly flash, the Thunderstorm Watch Face should be one of the very first watch-faces you look at!

Meh. Just meh So ive been using this watch face since the day i got my watch but now switched on to something else.  Why? Well because its boring. Very very little things to change watch faces   needs a major update with different faces and better working battery level indicator. Its all great but not able to change things up.  Least when i have it on my phone its just ment to be a background show of lights to improve on just regular still pictures.   But watch. The watch face is the star.These are like indie movie stars
Devs who respond ROCK! Originally gave this a 1 star due to crashes. Issue was fixed and the Dev responded! Rating has been updated!
Samsung fit gear Couldn't get it to work. I really want it though if you get it to work with my gear I'll repurchase it. I love the background and would really like to match them.
Would not center on my moto 360! :(
recentChanges: - Fixed 'flat tire' handling on Motorola devices
- New pref to allow full frame watch markings on flat-tire devices
- Can display mini digital time on analog faces
- Watch faces resize to get out of the way of notifications
